verses.verse: To the chief <S%H5329>Musician<s%>, A Psalm of <S%H1732>David<s%>, the <S%H5650>servant<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, who <S%H1696>spake<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> the <S%H1697>words<s%> of this <S%H7892>song<s%> in the <S%H3117>day<s%> that the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H5337>delivered<s%> him from the <S%H3709>hand<s%> of all his <S%H341>enemies<s%>, and from the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of <S%H7586>Saul<s%>: And he <S%H559>said<s%>, I will <S%H7355>love<s%> thee, O <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, my <S%H2391>strength<s%>.

The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> is my <S%H5553>rock<s%>, and my <S%H4686>fortress<s%>, and my <S%H6403>deliverer<s%>; my <S%H410>God<s%>, my <S%H6697>strength<s%>, in whom I will <S%H2620>trust<s%>; my <S%H4043>buckler<s%>, and the <S%H7161>horn<s%> of my <S%H3468>salvation<s%>, and my high <S%H4869>tower<s%>. my strength: Heb. my rock
I will <S%H7121>call<s%> upon the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, who is worthy to be <S%H1984>praised<s%>: so shall I be <S%H3467>saved<s%> from mine <S%H341>enemies<s%>.
The <S%H2256>sorrows<s%> of <S%H4194>death<s%> <S%H661>compassed<s%> me, and the <S%H5158>floods<s%> of ungodly <S%H1100>men<s%> made me <S%H1204>afraid<s%>. ungodly men: Heb. Belial
The <S%H2256>sorrows<s%> of <S%H7585>hell<s%> compassed me <S%H5437>about<s%>: the <S%H4170>snares<s%> of <S%H4194>death<s%> <S%H6923>prevented<s%> me. sorrows: or, cords

In my <S%H6862>distress<s%> I <S%H7121>called<s%> upon the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, and <S%H7768>cried<s%> unto my <S%H430>God<s%>: he <S%H8085>heard<s%> my <S%H6963>voice<s%> out of his <S%H1964>temple<s%>, and my <S%H7775>cry<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> him, even into his <S%H241>ears<s%>.

Then the <S%H776>earth<s%> <S%H1607>shook<s%> and <S%H7493>trembled<s%>; the <S%H4146>foundations<s%> also of the <S%H2022>hills<s%> <S%H7264>moved<s%> and were <S%H1607>shaken<s%>, because he was <S%H2734>wroth<s%>.

There went <S%H5927>up<s%> a <S%H6227>smoke<s%> out of his <S%H639>nostrils<s%>, and <S%H784>fire<s%> out of his <S%H6310>mouth<s%> <S%H398>devoured<s%>: <S%H1513>coals<s%> were <S%H1197>kindled<s%> by it. out of his nostrils: Heb. by his, etc
He <S%H5186>bowed<s%> the <S%H8064>heavens<s%> also, and came <S%H3381>down<s%>: and <S%H6205>darkness<s%> was under his <S%H7272>feet<s%>.
And he <S%H7392>rode<s%> upon a <S%H3742>cherub<s%>, and did <S%H5774>fly<s%>: yea, he did <S%H1675>fly<s%> upon the <S%H3671>wings<s%> of the <S%H7307>wind<s%>.

He <S%H7896>made<s%> <S%H2822>darkness<s%> his secret <S%H5643>place<s%>; his <S%H5521>pavilion<s%> round <S%H5439>about<s%> him were <S%H2824>dark<s%> <S%H4325>waters<s%> and thick <S%H5645>clouds<s%> of the <S%H7834>skies<s%>.
At the <S%H5051>brightness<s%> that was before him his thick <S%H5645>clouds<s%> <S%H5674>passed<s%>, <S%H1259>hail<s%> stones and <S%H1513>coals<s%> of <S%H784>fire<s%>.

The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> also <S%H7481>thundered<s%> in the <S%H8064>heavens<s%>, and the <S%H5945>Highest<s%> <S%H5414>gave<s%> his <S%H6963>voice<s%>; <S%H1259>hail<s%> stones and <S%H1513>coals<s%> of <S%H784>fire<s%>.
Yea, he sent <S%H7971>out<s%> his <S%H2671>arrows<s%>, and <S%H6327>scattered<s%> them; and he shot <S%H7232>out<s%> <S%H1300>lightnings<s%>, and <S%H2000>discomfited<s%> them.

Then the <S%H650>channels<s%> of <S%H4325>waters<s%> were <S%H7200>seen<s%>, and the <S%H4146>foundations<s%> of the <S%H8398>world<s%> were <S%H1540>discovered<s%> at thy <S%H1606>rebuke<s%>, O <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, at the <S%H5397>blast<s%> of the <S%H7307>breath<s%> of thy <S%H639>nostrils<s%>.
He <S%H7971>sent<s%> from <S%H4791>above<s%>, he <S%H3947>took<s%> me, he <S%H4871>drew<s%> me out of <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H4325>waters<s%>. many: or, great
He <S%H5337>delivered<s%> me from my <S%H5794>strong<s%> <S%H341>enemy<s%>, and from them which <S%H8130>hated<s%> me: for they were too <S%H553>strong<s%> for me.
They <S%H6923>prevented<s%> me in the <S%H3117>day<s%> of my <S%H343>calamity<s%>: but the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> was my <S%H4937>stay<s%>.
He brought me <S%H3318>forth<s%> also into a large <S%H4800>place<s%>; he <S%H2502>delivered<s%> me, because he <S%H2654>delighted<s%> in me.
The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1580>rewarded<s%> me according to my <S%H6664>righteousness<s%>; according to the <S%H1252>cleanness<s%> of my <S%H3027>hands<s%> hath he <S%H7725>recompensed<s%> me.
For I have <S%H8104>kept<s%> the <S%H1870>ways<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, and have not wickedly <S%H7561>departed<s%> from my <S%H430>God<s%>.
For all his <S%H4941>judgments<s%> were before me, and I did not put <S%H5493>away<s%> his <S%H2708>statutes<s%> from me.
I was also <S%H8549>upright<s%> before him, and I <S%H8104>kept<s%> myself from mine <S%H5771>iniquity<s%>. before: Heb. with

Therefore hath the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H7725>recompensed<s%> me according to my <S%H6664>righteousness<s%>, according to the <S%H1252>cleanness<s%> of my <S%H3027>hands<s%> in his <S%H5869>eyesight<s%>. in: Heb. before his eyes
With the <S%H2623>merciful<s%> thou wilt shew thyself <S%H2616>merciful<s%>; with an <S%H8549>upright<s%> <S%H1399>man<s%> thou wilt shew thyself <S%H8552>upright<s%>;
With the <S%H1305>pure<s%> thou wilt shew thyself <S%H1305>pure<s%>; and with the <S%H6141>froward<s%> thou wilt shew thyself <S%H6617>froward<s%>. shew thyself froward: or, wrestle
For thou wilt <S%H3467>save<s%> the <S%H6041>afflicted<s%> <S%H5971>people<s%>; but wilt bring <S%H8213>down<s%> <S%H7311>high<s%> <S%H5869>looks<s%>.
For thou wilt <S%H215>light<s%> my <S%H5216>candle<s%>: the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> my <S%H430>God<s%> will <S%H5050>enlighten<s%> my <S%H2822>darkness<s%>. candle: or, lamp
For by thee I have run <S%H7323>through<s%> a <S%H1416>troop<s%>; and by my <S%H430>God<s%> have I leaped <S%H1801>over<s%> a <S%H7791>wall<s%>. run: or, broken

As for <S%H410>God<s%>, his <S%H1870>way<s%> is <S%H8549>perfect<s%>: the <S%H565>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> is <S%H6884>tried<s%>: he is a <S%H4043>buckler<s%> to all those that <S%H2620>trust<s%> in him. tried: or, refined
For who is <S%H433>God<s%> <S%H1107>save<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>? or who is a <S%H6697>rock<s%> <S%H2108>save<s%> our <S%H430>God<s%>?
It is <S%H410>God<s%> that <S%H247>girdeth<s%> me with <S%H2428>strength<s%>, and <S%H5414>maketh<s%> my <S%H1870>way<s%> <S%H8549>perfect<s%>.
He <S%H7737>maketh<s%> my <S%H7272>feet<s%> like <S%H355>hinds'<s%> feet, and <S%H5975>setteth<s%> me upon my high <S%H1116>places<s%>.
He <S%H3925>teacheth<s%> my <S%H3027>hands<s%> to <S%H4421>war<s%>, so that a <S%H7198>bow<s%> of <S%H5154>steel<s%> is <S%H5181>broken<s%> by mine <S%H2220>arms<s%>.

Thou hast also <S%H5414>given<s%> me the <S%H4043>shield<s%> of thy <S%H3468>salvation<s%>: and thy right <S%H3225>hand<s%> hath holden me <S%H5582>up<s%>, and thy <S%H6037>gentleness<s%> hath made me <S%H7235>great<s%>. thy gentleness: or, with thy meekness thou hast multiplied me
Thou hast <S%H7337>enlarged<s%> my <S%H6806>steps<s%> under me, that my <S%H7166>feet<s%> did not <S%H4571>slip<s%>. my feet: Heb. mine ankles
I have <S%H7291>pursued<s%> mine <S%H341>enemies<s%>, and <S%H5381>overtaken<s%> them: neither did I turn <S%H7725>again<s%> till they were <S%H3615>consumed<s%>.
I have <S%H4272>wounded<s%> them that they were not <S%H3201>able<s%> to <S%H6965>rise<s%>: they are <S%H5307>fallen<s%> under my <S%H7272>feet<s%>.

For thou hast <S%H247>girded<s%> me with <S%H2428>strength<s%> unto the <S%H4421>battle<s%>: thou hast <S%H3766>subdued<s%> under me those that rose <S%H6965>up<s%> against me. subdued: Heb. caused to bow
Thou hast also <S%H5414>given<s%> me the <S%H6203>necks<s%> of mine <S%H341>enemies<s%>; that I might <S%H6789>destroy<s%> them that <S%H8130>hate<s%> me.
They <S%H7768>cried<s%>, but there was none to <S%H3467>save<s%> them: even unto the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, but he <S%H6030>answered<s%> them not.
Then did I <S%H7833>beat<s%> them small as the <S%H6083>dust<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H7307>wind<s%>: I did cast them <S%H7324>out<s%> as the <S%H2916>dirt<s%> in the <S%H2351>streets<s%>.

Thou hast <S%H6403>delivered<s%> me from the <S%H7379>strivings<s%> of the <S%H5971>people<s%>; and thou hast <S%H7760>made<s%> me the <S%H7218>head<s%> of the <S%H1471>heathen<s%>: a <S%H5971>people<s%> whom I have not <S%H3045>known<s%> shall <S%H5647>serve<s%> me.

As soon as they <S%H8088>hear<s%> <S%H241><s%> of me, they shall <S%H8085>obey<s%> me: the <S%H1121>strangers<s%> <S%H5236><s%> shall <S%H3584>submit<s%> themselves unto me. As soon: Heb. At the hearing of the ear submit: or, yield feigned obedience strangers: Heb. sons of the stranger
The <S%H1121>strangers<s%> <S%H5236><s%> shall fade <S%H5034>away<s%>, and be <S%H2727>afraid<s%> out of their close <S%H4526>places<s%>. strangers: Heb. sons of the stranger
The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H2416>liveth<s%>; and <S%H1288>blessed<s%> be my <S%H6697>rock<s%>; and let the <S%H430>God<s%> of my <S%H3468>salvation<s%> be <S%H7311>exalted<s%>.
It is <S%H410>God<s%> that <S%H5414>avengeth<s%> <S%H5360><s%> me, and <S%H1696>subdueth<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> under me. avengeth: Heb. giveth avengements for subdueth: or, destroyeth

He <S%H6403>delivereth<s%> me from mine <S%H341>enemies<s%>: yea, thou liftest me <S%H7311>up<s%> above those that rise <S%H6965>up<s%> against me: thou hast <S%H5337>delivered<s%> me from the <S%H2555>violent<s%> <S%H376>man<s%>. violent: Heb. man of violence
Therefore will I give <S%H3034>thanks<s%> unto thee, O <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, among the <S%H1471>heathen<s%>, and sing <S%H2167>praises<s%> unto thy <S%H8034>name<s%>. give: or, confess

<S%H1431>Great<s%> <S%H3444>deliverance<s%> giveth he to his <S%H4428>king<s%>; and <S%H6213>sheweth<s%> <S%H2617>mercy<s%> to his <S%H4899>anointed<s%>, to <S%H1732>David<s%>, and to his <S%H2233>seed<s%> <S%H5704>for<s%> <S%H5769>evermore<s%>.
